name: Suspicious Spaceroads
description:
Inspired heavily by the classic "Skyroads" and left wanting by other clones, you'll love it if you want a modernized blast from the past.

The dot points:
  • Defy the laws of physics
  • Utilize speed and precision to establish dominance over 25 stages.
  • Witness a variety of suspicious, and quite frankly weird, platforming situations.
  • Plethora of neat tricks to discover and exploit.

Please enjoy!
